recommendations: Aditi Mittal “Naman and I joined Saxo at the same time and have worked in different but highly interconnected roles since the beginning of our journey. I can say with certainty that Naman is an intelligent, hardworking and highly motivated self-starter. As one of the only BA in Saxo of his age and experience he has crafted a very unique path and broken a lot of the beliefs around high experience required for the position. He has worked very hard to amass a great deal of knowledge and subsequently led and brought in a lot of projects that he has seen through end to end, from getting in requirements from our clients to delivering the final solution. Personally, it has always been a pleasure working with him since he is a highly supportive individual who is crystal clear with the requirements that he brings in and helps resolve any roadblocks in task scoping and analysis”

Nitin Arora “I highly recommend Naman Jain for his exceptional work ethic, attention to detail, and strong problem-solving skills. He consistently demonstrates a keen understanding of tasks and contributes positively to team dynamics. Naman's dedication and innovative mindset make him an asset to any project or organization.”
